author: Source: SiliconValley.com
title: Review: 'Steve Jobs' does justice to its iconic subject - SiliconValley.com
text:
Throughout director Danny Boyle's "Steve Jobs" biopic, the famed Apple co-founder trumpets each new product launch as a profound moment in history. While Jobs was too complex and iconic to be judged merely by his massive ego -- he did, after all, help revolutionize technology --it's understandable to be wary of a movie seemingly obsessed with portraying him as a cultural messiah.
 SiliconValley.com.
